articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Strategic Submarine Underwater Ballistic Missile Test-fire
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Strategic Submarine Underwater Ballistic Missile Test-fire
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- A test-fire of strategic submarine-launched ballistic missile was successfully conducted under the guidance of supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					 At the observation post he was briefed on the plan for the test-fire.
					
					 As soon as he issued an order to start the test-fire, the strategic submarine submerged up to a depth for firing the ballistic missile and rapidly launched the ballistic missile.
					
					 The test-fire which was conducted under a high-angle fire system in the maximum launching depth reconfirmed the stability of the underwater ballistic launching system, the starting character of the high power solid fuel engine and phased flying kinetic feature after coming up to the surface of the water. It proved that the core technical indexes of the ballistic missile including the reliability of the phased heat separation and the control and guidance system and the working accuracy of the warhead in the re-entry section perfectly met all requirements for operation.
					
					 The SLBM test-fire was successfully carried out without any adverse impact on neighboring countries.
					
					 Watching the trajectory of the ballistic missile Pukguksong, he said with pleasure that it was a great manifestation and demonstration of the tremendous power and inexhaustible muscle of the DPRK and he felt enormous energy was welling out.
					
					 He appreciated the test-fire as the greatest success and victory and highly praised the officials, scientists and technicians in the field of national defence science and munitions factories for having perfectly acquired the technology of SLBM in a short span of time and extended special thanks to them in the name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the supreme commander of the KPA.
					
					 He noted with pride that the results of the test-fire proved in actuality that the DPRK joined the front rank of the military powers fully equipped with nuclear attack capability.
					
					 The U.S. vicious nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK only resulted in bolstering up its nuclear attack capability hour by hour and the U.S. mainland and the operational theatre in the Pacific are now within the striking range of the KPA, no matter how hard the U.S. tries to deny it, he said.
					
					 Strongly warning the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group staging the joint military exercise aiming at a preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK with huge nuclear strategic assets involved and thereby seriously rattling its nerves, he said the Korean people would deal merciless blows at them with nuclear hammers of justice so that nails of injustice may not come out again, once an opportunity is given, now that the DPRK has in place all substantial means capable of standing up against the U.S. nuclear hegemony.
					
					 He noted: "I do not guess what ridiculous remarks the U.S. and its followers will make about this test-fire, but I can say their rash acts will only precipitate their self-destruction.  The best way of escaping the deadly strike of the infuriated KPA is to refrain from hurting the dignity and security of the DPRK with prudence and self-control."
					
					 Warning the enemies not to underestimate the might of the DPRK, he said it would clearly show the world how it would proudly tower, after breaking the chains of sanctions, blockade and pressure of the enemies.
					
					 He stressed the need for the field of national defence science to put increased spurs to mounting nuclear warheads on ballistic missiles in order to cope with the unpredicted total war and nuclear war with the U.S. imperialists and, at the same time, focus all efforts on the development of means of their delivery.
					
					 He instructed officials to take a series of all eventful actions to demonstrate the DPRK's muscle as a full-fledged military power if the enemies try to threaten its dignity and the right to existence even a bit.
					
					 He warmly greeted the national defence scientists and service personnel of the navy returning to the port after the successful test-fire and warmly congratulated them.
					
					 He had a photo session with them.

articles.title: Senior Party, State Officials Visit Revolutionary Museum of Ministry of People's Armed Forces
articles.content:
Senior Party, State Officials Visit Revolutionary Museum of Ministry of People's Armed Forces
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials visited the Revolutionary Museum of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces on Thursday, the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 They included Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and Choe Ryong Hae, members of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Workers' Party of Korea, and other leading party and state officials, and officials of the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions.
					
					 They laid bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il at the ministry and paid tributes to them.
					
					 The visitors looked around the Hall "Supreme Commander and Comrades-in-Arms" in the revolutionary museum.

articles.title: Day of Songun Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
Day of Songun Marked in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The service personnel and people of the DPRK significantly celebrated the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership (the Day of Songun).
					 A large number of people visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, the sacred temple of Juche, where President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state.
					
					 Entering the plaza park, the masses made bows to the portraits of the smiling great leaders.
					
					 Service personnel and people visited the statues of the great leaders and portraits of the smiling great leaders on Mansu Hill and in other parts of the country before laying floral baskets, bouquets and flowers and paid homage to them.
					
					 Concert "Blue Sky over My Country" was given by the National Symphony Orchestra at the Moranbong Theatre in Pyongyang and music and dance story "Autobiography of Youth" at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre.
					
					 Revolutionary drama "A Letter from a Daughter" was given at the National Theatre and acrobatic performance and magic performance were given at the Pyongyang Circus Theatre and the Magic Theatre.
					
					 Art performances were given by provincial art troupes in Sinuiju, Haeju, Kanggye, Chongjin, Hamhung, Hyesan and other places.
					
					 Art performance "Great Songun feats will be immortal" was given by the artistes of the North Hwanghae Provincial Art Squad, an oratorical meeting "Place Youth in Era of Songun Should Stand" by the youth and students in North Phyongan Province and an art performance by members of the women's union and youths and students at Haean Square of Wonsan City.
					
					 A men's football game between the Ryesonggang Sports Team and the Wolmido Football Team took place at the Sariwon Youth Stadium.

articles.title: Revolutionary Drama Given at Pyongyang Grand Theatre
articles.content:
Revolutionary Drama Given at Pyongyang Grand Theatre
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Revolutionary drama "Victory of the Revolution Is in Sight" was given at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Thursday, the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Among the audience were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other leading officials of the party, state and army and officials of the armed forces organs working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions and officials here.
					
					 The drama depicting Choe Hui Suk, anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter, who cried that she sees the victory of revolution though she lost her two eyes by the Japanese imperialists, impressively shows what the faith of a true revolutionary is like.

articles.title: Youngsters' Dancing Party Observes Day of Songun
articles.content:
Youngsters' Dancing Party Observes Day of Songun
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youths and students took place in various parts of the DPRK Thursday, the 56th Day of Songun.
					 Dancing parties started with the song "Long Live Great Songun General" at the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding, Arch of Triumph and Pyongyang Railway Station.
					
					 The youths and students enthusiastically danced, recollecting the revolutionary career of leader Kim Jong Il who firmly protected the destiny of the country and its people and provided an eternal foundation for the prosperity of the nation with his Songun leadership.
					
					 They danced to the tune of the songs "Joy of People" and "Country for People" in boundless reverence for Marshal Kim Jong Un who has carried forward the Songun revolutionary cause of the great leaders and added glory to the dignity and might of the country.
					
					 Cheerful music of the songs "Young People, Be Loyal to Our Party" and "Our Future Is Bright" revved up the atmosphere.
					
					 There were similar parties in provincial seats that day.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were laid before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the Day of Songun.
					 Service personnel, working people of various circles and youths and students visited the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill to pay tributes to them.
					
					 A floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), was seen standing before the statues.
					
					 Laid there were floral baskets in names of the party, armed forces, power organs, public organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, institutions, enterprises, factories and schools at all levels, and bouquets and flowers.
					
					 Visitors paid tributes to the great leaders before their statues.
					
					 People of various circles visited the statues of the great leaders at Kim Il Sung University, Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, Ministry of People's Security, Mansudae Art Studio and other places here and portraits of the smiling great leaders.
					
					 Service personnel, working people and youths and students across the country visited the statues of the great leaders and mosaics of the smiling great leaders in their residential areas to pay tributes to them.

articles.title: Leadership Members of Popular Liberation Movement of Angola on Friendly and Cooperative Relations with WPK
articles.content:
Leadership Members of Popular Liberation Movement of Angola on Friendly and Cooperative Relations with WPK
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Members of the leadership of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola met with a delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) participating in the 7th Congress of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola and expressed the will to boost the cooperative relations between the two parties and the two countries.
					 General Secretary Juliao Mateus Paulo said that the relations between the two parties have become more excellent and are developing further than ever before.
					
					 The WPK led by Chairman Kim Jong Un and the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola led by President Jose Eduardo Dos Santos are registering big successes in the struggle for the welfare of the people, he said, and continued:
					
					 The West are floating all kinds of false propaganda to estrange the two parties and the two countries from each other and are finding fault with the two countries when things go on well there.
					
					 But the joint cause of the WPK and the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola will continue to victoriously advance.
					
					 We fully support the cause of the WPK waging staunch struggle against the hostile forces under the wise guidance of Comrade Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Popular Liberation Movement of Angola will as ever strive hard to consolidate and develop the relations between the two parties and the two countries.
					
					 Secretary Jorge Inocencio Dombolo said that the participation of the WPK delegation in the 7th Congress of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola offered a meaningful occasion in demonstrating the might of the traditional relations of friendship between the two parties which have developed based on mutual support and solidarity.
					
					 The director for Foreign Relations noted that the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola and the Angolan people would actively strive to invariably strengthen the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation with the WPK and the Korean people in the future, too.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group of Traitors Have to Be Thrown Overboard: Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group of Traitors Have to Be Thrown Overboard: Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- U.S. President Obama who committed to building "a world without nuclear weapons" is blustering that he would declare "no-first use of nuclear weapons" now that his tenure is almost running out. 
					 A spokesman for the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee in a statement Thursday terms this a mockery of humankind aspiring after world peace and stability and the height of shamelessness as it is a sleight of hand to beautify the signboard of the "world without nuclear weapons" and improve his popularity that went into a tailspin.
					
					 What is disgusting is that the poor south Korean puppet forces are begging their American master not to give up the principle of preemptive nuclear attack, being fidgety over the U.S. deceptive farce.
					
					 The puppet forces' servile act clearly represents the true nature of the stupid and pitiful colonial stooge who is unable to sustain even a moment being away from the care of master.
					
					 This is little short of self-admittance before the world that the puppet forces have looked for an opportunity to provoke a nuclear war against the north together with the U.S. after making it a fait accompli to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK. 
					
					 By origin, preemptive nuclear attack is an undisguised and brigandish doctrine of aggression which the U.S. has invariably maintained since the very first day it possessed a nuclear weapon.
					
					 The DPRK had access to nuclear weapons and has steadily bolstered them up, legitimate self-defensive measure to protect the sovereignty of the country and the right to existence of the nation from the U.S. ceaseless nuclear war threat and blackmail.
					
					 The more frantically the U.S. and the puppet forces resort to the moves to provoke a nuclear war against the DPRK, the more strongly it will bolster its nuclear deterrence for self-defence.
					
					 No matter how loudly the puppet group may trumpet about "nuclear threat from the north" and "provocation", they can never cover up the U.S. attempt at a preemptive nuclear attack on the north and their despicable criminal scheme to provoke a dangerous nuclear war.
					
					 The puppet forces who are trying to inflict nuclear disaster on the Korean peninsula by begging the gangster U.S., which is seeking world domination by dint of nuclear weapons, to inflict a preemptive nuclear strike at the fellow countrymen are a group of matchless traitors who are utterly in disregard of the destiny of the nation.
					
					 The whole Korean nation should courageously turn out in the struggle to throw overboard the group of traitors, despicable nuclear war servants of the U.S. and nuclear war maniacs, and to safeguard peace and stability on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Contributors to Construction of Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3 Commended
articles.content:
Contributors to Construction of Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3 Commended
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The DPRK commended officials, and commanding officers and members of the youth shock brigades and builders who performed labor feats in the construction of the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3 and officials, scientists, technicians and workers who contributed to the production of custom-built equipment, supply of materials and transport.
					 The title of Labor Hero and gold medal (hammer and sickle) and Order of National Flag First Class were awarded to Jon Yong Nam, Jon Chun Gil, Kim Phok Sun and 11 other persons.
					
					 Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize went to 22 persons and Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize to 25 persons.
					
					 The title of Driver of Merit was conferred on two persons, Order of National Flag First Class on 67 persons, Order of Labor on 17 persons, Order of National Flag Second Class on 363 persons, Order of National Flag Third Class on 858 persons, Distinguished Military Service Medal on two persons and Medal of Merit on 866 persons.
					
					 A relevant decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK was published on Thursday.

articles.title: Medals Awarded to Participants in Construction of Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station
articles.content:
Medals Awarded to Participants in Construction of Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station
Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Construction of the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station Medals were awarded to 3,051 officials, and commanding officers and members of the youth shock brigades and builders who participated in the construction of the power station.
					 A relevant decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK was published on Thursday.

articles.title: Participants in 9th Congress of Youth League Visit Different Places
articles.content:
Participants in 9th Congress of Youth League Visit Different Places
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League visited the Phyongchon Revolutionary Site.
					 They laid bouquets before the mosaic portraying President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They went round historical mementoes on display.
					
					 They visited the historic site associated with the Fatherland Liberation War. They went round different places of the site including the supreme command post associated with the feats Kim Il Sung performed by winning the victory in the war.
					
					 They also visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum.
					
					 They paid tribute to the statue of Kim Il Sung waving back to the columns of the military parade at the square for celebrating the victory in the war.
					
					 They laid bouquets before the sculpture "Victory" in the Monument to the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War and paid homage to the winners in the great years.
					
					 They went round different halls of the museum.

articles.title: National Workers Sports Contest Closes
articles.content:
National Workers Sports Contest Closes
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The national workers sports contest for marking the Day of Songun closed with due ceremony at the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street on Thursday.
					 The Capital City Construction Commission took the first place in total points.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Saitama Prefectural Council for Japan-Korea Friendship and Solidarity led by Secretary General Gazuhiko Shimada left here for home on Thursday.

articles.title: Peerlessly Great Men and Youth Power
articles.content:
Peerlessly Great Men and Youth Power
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The people of the DPRK are recalling with deep emotion the brilliant path covered by its young people under the loving care of the peerlessly great men with the 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League as an occasion.
					 The sacred patriotic tradition of the Korean youth was created by young vanguards and guerilla fighters who carved out the Korean revolution and waged the bloody anti-Japanese armed struggle under the leadership of President Kim Il sung.
					
					 The President aroused all the patriotic young people to building a new country by rallying them under the banner of democracy after the country's liberation from Japan's colonial rule and inspired them to immortal feats during the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 In the periods of the postwar reconstruction, the great Chollima upswing and the socialist construction, he led young people to taking the lead in all struggles and thus glorifying their proud history and tradition.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il set forth the slogan "Love the young people!" and had shown boundless loving care for them, calling them the reserve combat unit and detached force of the Supreme Commander and the eternal companions of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 In the period of the Arduous March, the forced march, he personally named a highway "Youth Hero Motorway" to convey the feats performed by its young builders to posterity and put forward those, who dedicated their all for society, the collective and comrades, as the paragons of the Songun era.
					
					 He also set the foundation day of the Young Communist League of Korea as the Youth Day (August 28) and saw to it that the youth league is shined with the august name of the President.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un has encouraged young people to perform great feats in all fields of building a socialist power and prepare themselves for the vanguard fighters of the revolution.
					
					 Whenever he meets soldiers of the Korean People's Army, he has had photo sessions with them.
					
					 And he highly praised the patriotic devotion made by members of the youth shock brigade in building the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station as a symbol of youth power.

articles.title: DPRK's Songun Politics Lauded
articles.content:
DPRK's Songun Politics Lauded 
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Today is the Day of Songun (military-first) in the DPRK.
					 56 years ago today, leader Kim Jong Il began his Songun leadership with the inspection of the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army. 
					
					 Thanks to his Songun leadership, the DPRK could firmly defend socialism, demonstrating its might as a military power capable of frustrating any formidable enemy. 
					
					 Now, the people of the DPRK are stepping up the construction of a socialist power, shattering all challenges of the U.S.-led imperialists. Therefore, it is quite natural that the Songun politics has been highly appreciated by the international community.
					
					 A member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Communist Party of Nepal (Maoist) said that Kim Jong Il had developed the Songun politics in ideological, systematical and practical way to defend its dignity and sovereignty against the imperialist allied forces. 
					
					 The secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea said that peace can never be settled in all countries without putting an end to the imperialists' high-handedness and arbitrariness, adding:
					
					 The reality goes to prove that the way to build a new independent and peaceful world lies in following the Songun politics. As the DPRK has been led by the peerlessly great men, it could emerge as a power with immense self-defence capability and as a model for the world progressives.
					
					 A head of a delegation of the Workers' Party of Mexico, which visited the DPRK, said:
					
					 As supreme leader Kim Jong Un has creditably carried forward the Songun politics, the DPRK is successfully building a socialist power, defending its sovereignty and fully displaying its dignity to the world. Thanks to the Songun politics, the DPRK could strengthen its military muscle, have the strongest army and launch strong offensive against threats posed by the imperialists.

articles.title: Great Exploits Performed by Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Great Exploits Performed by Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- On the Day of Songun (August 25), the servicepersons and people are recollecting the great feats performed by leader Kim Jong Il in developing the DPRK into a powerful nuclear weapons state.
					 Entering the new century, the Bush administration reduced the DPRK-U.S. Agreed Framework into a dead document and listed the DPRK as a target of its preemptive nuclear attack.
					
					 Under these circumstances, Kim Jong Il made a bold decision to frustrate the enemies' attempt for preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK.
					
					 In January, Juche 92 (2003), the DPRK government declared its withdrawal from NPT. And the DPRK conducted a successful underground nuclear test in October, 2006.
					
					 After Obama's assumption of the presidency, the U.S. has as ever become frantic in its moves for provoking a nuclear war against the DPRK, assembling nuclear task forces around the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 To cope with the crucial situation, the DPRK carried out another successful underground nuclear test in May 2009 as part of its efforts to bolster up its self-defensive nuclear deterrent.
					
					 Through successful underground nuclear tests, the DPRK made a breach in the U.S. doctrine of nuke almighty and fully demonstrated the might of its nuclear deterrent capable of defending peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia and the world.
					
					 Thanks to the iron will of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is creditably materializing the last instructions of Kim Jong Il, the DPRK could succeed in the third underground nuclear test and first H-bomb test, emerging as a nuclear power.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary Idea and Feats Will Be Immortal: Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary Idea and Feats Will Be Immortal: Newspapers
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership with his visit to the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, Juche 49 (1960) was a solemn declaration heralding the steadfast succession of the revolutionary cause of President Kim Il Sung, says leading newspapers here Thursday.
					 This day helped give a steady continuity to the history of the Korean revolution that attaches importance to the army and the tradition of victory, put the dignity and power of the revolutionary Paektusan nation on the highest level and make the socialist cause dynamically advance along its orbit, overcoming all storms and difficulties, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 The Korean people have enjoyed an independent life without war for decades and the peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of the world have been firmly defended. This would be unthinkable apart from the Day of Songun.
					
					 The great Comrade Kim Jong Il was the distinguished leader and peerlessly elder statesman who recorded the immortal revolutionary history under the unfurled banner of Songun for over half a century.
					
					 He formulated and systematized the Songun revolutionary idea and created the original Songun political mode. This is the feat to be recorded in human history which provided the immortal banner for the triumphant advance of the cause of the Juche revolution and the cause of independence against imperialism.
					
					 As the Korean people have held him in the van of the Songun revolution, the lifeline of the powerful Paektusan nation has been given a steady continuity, the worldwide example was created in realizing the cause of immortality of the leader and the invincibility of Korean-style socialism has been powerfully demonstrated. The political and ideological power, matchless military power, the youth power without an equal in the world, great army-people unity and the solid economic and cultural foundation for the building of a thriving nation are the noble fruition of his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Minju Joson says the history of his Songun revolution is being given a steady continuity thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un, calling upon all service personnel and other people to dynamically advance to bring earlier the victory of the cause of the Juche revolution and the cause of the Songun revolution, rallied close around him.

articles.title: Minju Joson Brands Park Geun Hye Group's Remarks on Sanctions against DPRK as Hysterics
articles.content:
Minju Joson Brands Park Geun Hye Group's Remarks on Sanctions against DPRK as Hysterics
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- In recent days the Park Geun Hye group is often saying that the "sanctions against the north is getting very effective" and that the "unique means for making the north dismantle its nuclear weapons are sanctions and pressure".
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Thursday terms it hysterics.
					
					Today the army and people of the DPRK are making world-startling miracles and brilliant successes in bolstering up nuclear deterrent and building socialist economy under the uplifted banner of the self-development-first principle, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 Park's assertion is, in essence, a paradox to tarnish the image of the daily-developing DPRK by misleading the public opinion at home and abroad.
					
					 It is little short of heinous last-ditch effort to keep up Park's policy for confrontation with the DPRK, which is on the verge of bankruptcy.
					
					 It is also a futile move of fools to soothe their miserable position of being driven into a predicament while getting frenzy with their sanctions racket against the DPRK.
					
					 The Park group should bear in mind that its persistent policy for confrontation with the DPRK and sanctions against it can never work on the latter and that it can never evade the miserable fate of being driven into the cesspool of history.

articles.title: Proposal for Substitute Site for THAAD Deployment Opposed
articles.content:
Proposal for Substitute Site for THAAD Deployment Opposed
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The Action for Checking THAAD Deployment in south Korea held a press conference outside the building of the puppet Ministry of Defense on August 23 opposing the proposal for a substitute site for THAAD deployment, according to the south Korean internet paper Tongil News.
					 Speakers said it has been confirmed that the ministry was deeply involved in the proposal for the third site for THAAD deployment.
					
					 They noted that countermeasures taken by neighboring countries and military tension increasing on the Korean peninsula after the decision on THAAD deployment prove that the deployment is threatening security.

articles.title: Ulji Freedom Guardian Flayed by S. Korean Body
articles.content:
Ulji Freedom Guardian Flayed by S. Korean Body
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The South Kyongsang Provincial Emergency Situation Council for Peace against War in south Korea held a press conference at the provincial office on August 22 demanding the withdrawal of the decision on THAAD deployment, a halt to the war exercises and the conclusion of a peace treaty, according to OhmyNews, an internet newspaper of south Korea.
					 The large-scale Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises are beneficial only to the U.S. and Japan seeking to stage a comeback to the Korean peninsula, the organization said.
					
					 It demanded the authorities stop at once Ulji Freedom Guardian which will increase the danger of a war on the Korean peninsula, and opt for dialogue with the north as soon as possible.

articles.title: S. Korean Religionists Call for Achieving Peace on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
S. Korean Religionists Call for Achieving Peace on Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Religionists of four religious orders of Taejon and Sejong cities and South Chungchong Province of south Korea held a joint press conference in Taejon on August 24, according to the south Korean internet paper Tongil News.
					 Speakers called for lifting voices for peace against war forces trying to keep power by increasing the crisis and the danger of war.
					
					 A statement of religionists of four religious orders was published at the press conference.
					
					 We are resolutely opposed to THAAD deployment which will bring only the crisis of war and do harm to the people's life, the statement said.
					
					 It demanded the Park Geun Hye regime deny the triangular military alliance and opt for improved inter-Korean relations.
					
					 Great national unity is the only way of peace and reunification of all Koreans, it said, adding: We will demand the conclusion of a peace treaty for an end to war and durable peace mechanism on the Korean peninsula and call for achieving the great national unity.
					
					 The destiny of the Korean nation can be hewed out only by the concerted efforts of the nation.
					
					 We declare that the only way of peaceful reunification is to achieve the great national unity.

articles.title: Policy of Valuing Youth Lauded by Foreign Personages
articles.content:
Policy of Valuing Youth Lauded by Foreign Personages
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Young people of the DPRK are playing a leading role as a driving force of the revolution and construction in the DPRK, which has been admired by foreign personages in different countries of the world.
					 The first Secretary of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Young Communist League of the Russian Federation said:
					
					 The youth movement in the DPRK has developed along the road of victory and glory under the loving care of the peerlessly great men. Carrying forward the cause of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il had paid deep attention to the youth issue and made a great contribution to the development of the youth movement with his policy of valuing the youth.
					
					 A head of a delegation of the Vietnam Ho Chi Minh Communist Youth Union noted that leader Kim Jong Il put forward young people as the forerunners of the era and the most viable unit of the society, adding: The youth in the DPRK rendered distinguished services in the struggle to build monumental edifices under his leadership. It can be seen only in the DPRK that the leader boundlessly loves the youth and the youth upholds the cause of the leader with loyalty.
					
					 The first secretary of the National Committee of the Union of Young Communists of Cuba stressed that true to leader Kim Jong Il's Songun politics, the youth in the DPRK played a big role in advancing socialism victoriously. He went on:
					
					 They are filled with great pride and self-confidence that they are upholding the respected Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the supreme leader of the party, state and army.
					
					 The deputy secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Youth Union said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il had shown boundless loving care for the youth. Today, the youth in the DPRK are vigorously advancing toward the future, filled with confidence and optimism.
					
					 Their working style comes to be a model for the world youth. The Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League is making a great contribution to the development of the world youth movement. 
					
					 The general-secretary of the World Federation of Democratic Youth said that the youth problem becomes a serious social concern in the world, but it has been successfully settled in the DPRK. 
					
					 Today, the youth movement in the DPRK serves as a model in the world youth movement, he noted.

articles.title: Russian Paper Lauds Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Russian Paper Lauds Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- A Russian paper on Aug. 18 dedicated an article to the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership illustrated with a portrait of the smiling leader.
					 The paper carried a picture of Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un standing together and a photo of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 In an article titled "Eternal sun of Songun Korea" the paper said:
					
					 Aug. 25, 1960 was a significant day when Kim Jong Il visited the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army and thus started his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 He inherited the idea and line of attaching importance to military affairs and thus comprehensively applied the Songun politics and led the drive for defending socialism to victory.
					
					 He elucidated the validity and originality of the Songun-based revolutionary line in various works including "The Songun-Based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution".
					
					 He provided field guidance to one KPA unit after another with the firm faith and will that one can defend socialism only when one relies on one's own powerful military strength.
					
					 So he bolstered up the military muscle in every way.
					
					 Thanks to his energetic Songun leadership, the DPRK has ranked itself among political and ideological powers and military powers and an eternal foundation for building a powerful socialist country was laid, bringing earlier the future of powerful Korea.
					
					 Kim Jong Il will live forever as the sun of Songun Korea.

articles.title: Korea's Liberation Day Observed by Kuwaiti Paper
articles.content:
Korea's Liberation Day Observed by Kuwaiti Paper
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The Kuwait Times on August 18 carried an article titled "71st anniversary of Korea's liberation".
					 Citing facts to expose that before the liberation of Korea, the Japanese imperialists made desperate efforts to exterminate the Korean nation through the medieval repressive rule, the paper said for the Korean people the liberation was not only the nation's rebirth but a historic event that brought about a turn in their destiny from slaves to masters.
					
					 The great Comrade Kim Il Sung led the 15 year-long anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory and thus achieved the cause of Korea's liberation and successfully realized the cause of building the party, army and state, it noted, and went on:
					
					 The liberation helped build the socialist system centered on the popular masses, invincible socialist state unfazed by any storm.
					
					 Socialist Korea was built on the basis of its original guiding idea from the beginning and has adhered to the principle of Juche in ideology, independence in politics, self-support in economy and self-reliance in national defense.
					
					 The DPRK has turned into an invincible power no one dares provoke and been admired by the international community as it has firmly defended its ideology, social system and cause for several decades, not taking even a step backward on the road of socialism chosen by itself.

articles.title: Day of Songun Marked in Germany
articles.content:
Day of Songun Marked in Germany
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Germany on August 20 to mark the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership (the Day of Songun).
					 Present there were officials and members of the German Communist Party and the German Group for the Study of Works of Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chairman of the German Communist Party in a speech said that Kim Jong Il built the DPRK into the invincible socialist power, put forward the Songun politics as the basic political mode under socialism and turned the DPRK into a military power and a people's paradise.
					
					 The great vitality and validity of the Songun politics have been clearly proved in the present reality, he said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. and the West are making every possible effort to bring down the DPRK, the socialist bulwark, but the DPRK, a nuclear weapons state, will always emerge victorious.
					
					 We are firmly standing on the side of the Korean people and will positively support the DPRK in the future, too.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: French Social Body: Dialogue for Ensuring Peace on Korean Peninsula Should Be Provided
articles.content:
French Social Body: Dialogue for Ensuring Peace on Korean Peninsula Should Be Provided
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The France-Korea Friendship Association posted an article on its website on Aug. 15.
					 The article said that dialogue for ensuring peace on the Korean peninsula should be provided as soon as possible.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The DPRK proposed opening a great national meeting for reunification on the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					
					 The south Korean authorities reacted to the proposal with reckless saber-rattling.
					
					 They are driving the situation on the peninsula to an extremely tense phase in collusion with the U.S.
					
					 Right after Korea's liberation the U.S. occupied south Korea.
					
					 In a so-called "congratulatory address," Park Geun Hye zealously supported the decision to deploy American THAAD in south Korea, an issue touching off serious protest and rejection of south Korean people, under the pretext of "provocation" and "threat" from the DPRK.
					
					 The large-scale Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercise will be staged in south Korea and huge aggressive forces of the U.S. will be involved in it.
					
					 We demand the cessation of military exercises with different codenames which escalate the tension on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Peru
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Peru
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Strengthening the People's Army Is an Essential Guarantee for Victoriously Accomplishing the Revolutionary Cause of Juche" was brought out in booklet by a Peruvian publishing house on August 20 on the Day of Songun.
					 The work, made public on February 22, Juche 87(1998), said that strengthening the people's army was an essential guarantee for victoriously accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche and indicated the tasks arising in developing the army into invincible revolutionary armed forces boundlessly loyal to the cause of the Juche revolution.

articles.title: Foreign Bodies Censure U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK and Park Geun Hye Regime's Sycophancy toward U.S.
articles.content:
Foreign Bodies Censure U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK and Park Geun Hye Regime's Sycophancy toward U.S.
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- An Ecuadorian insitution and organization and a Brazilian personage censured the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and the south Korean regime's sycophancy toward the U.S.
					 Kim Jong Il Library and the Juche Youth Group in Ecuador posted an article titled "U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK" on a website on Aug. 18.
					
					 Giving a detailed account of the root cause and injustice of the U.S. inveterate hostile policy toward the DPRK, the article claimed history proves that the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula spawned by the U.S. hostile policy.
					
					 The U.S. should unconditionally lift the anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK and refrain from screwing up tensions on the Korean peninsula, it added.
					
					 Rosanita Campos, vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, contributed an article accusing the south Korean Park Geun Hye regime of its moves to deploy THAAD to the newspaper Hora do Povo on Aug. 19.
					
					 Referring to the recent daily-mounting struggle of people of various circles opposed to the regime's act of sycophancy toward the U.S. to introduce THAAD into south Korea, the article said:
					
					 The Songju Struggle Committee for Checking Deployment of THAAD, residents of Songju County, people of various circles throughout south Korea remain unchanged in their demand for retraction of the decision to deploy THAAD, asserting they can never accept other proposal, except for the retraction, and there are no site suitable for THAAD.
					
					 The decision to deploy THAAD that will wreck peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia must be withdrawn.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige lanzamiento de prueba de SLBM
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige lanzamiento de prueba de SLBM
Pyongyang, 25 de agosto (ACNC) -- Bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, se realizo con exito el lanzamiento de prueba de misil balistico por el submarino estrategico. 
					El Mariscal dirigio el lanzamiento de prueba de misil balistico por el submarino estrategico. 
					
					En el puesto de vigilancia, el Mariscal averiguo el plan de lanzamiento y dio la orden de realizar el disparo. De inmediato, el submarino estrategico se sumergio hasta la profundidad de lanzamiento y lanzo con prontitud el misil balistico. 
					
					A traves del lanzamiento de prueba, realizado con el sistema de disparo de alto angulo en la profundidad maxima de lanzamiento, fueron reafirmadas la estabilidad del sistema de lanzamiento frio del cohete, la caracteristica de arranque del motor de gran potencia de combustible solido y la dinamica de vuelo por escalones del proyectil balistico durante su vuelo luego de salirse del agua. Y se confirmo que llegaron perfectamente a la demanda operacional los indicies tecnicos medulares del proyectil inclusive la confiabilidad del sistema de separacion termica por etapas, el de control y teledireccion y la exactitud de acertamiento de la ojiva combativa para la reentrada. 
					
					El presente lanzamiento se ejecuto exitosamente sin dar ninguna influencia negativa a la seguridad de los paises contornos. 
					
					Contemplando el cohete balistico "Pukkuksong", el Mariscal dijo con alegria que este lanzamiento es la gran explosion y plena manifestacion del inagotable poderio estatal y la fuerza condensada de Corea y le da el animo y la fuerza. 
					
					El presente lanzamiento deviene exito de los exitos y victoria de las victorias, acoto y evaluo altamente a los funcionarios, cientificos y tecnicos de la rama de ciencias de defensa nacional y las fabricas de materiales belicos quienes perfeccionaron completamente en un corto tiempo la tecnica de lanzamiento de SLBM. Y les dio el agradecimiento especial en nombre del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central, del PTC, y el Comandante Supremo del EPC. 
					
					Senalo con orgullo y dignidad que a traves del resultado de ensayo del proyectil balistico lanzado hoy se confirmo realmente el hecho de que la RPDC entro dignamente en la plena fila de las potencias militares dotadas perfectamente de la capacidad de ataque nuclear.
					
					Los perversos amenaza y chantaje nuclear de los Estados Unidos trajeron solo el resultado de fortalecer momento a momento nuestra capacidad de ofensiva nuclear, asevero y anadio que por mas que niegue EE.UU. ya estan indudablemente en nuestra mano el territorio principal norteamericano y la zona operacional del Pacifico.
					
					Advirtio seriamente sobre el hecho de que los imperialistas yanquis y los titeres surcoreanos nos incitan gravemente introduciendo ante nuestra vista un sinnumero de las propiedades estrategicas nucleares y realizando el entrenamiento militar conjunto para dar ataque sorpresivo nuclear a la RPDC. Puesto que hemos dotado de todos los medios reales para hacer frente a la hegemonia nuclear de EE.UU., senalo y subrayo que si nos toca la oportunidad el pueblo coreano golpeara sin piedad con el martillo nuclear de justicia a los medios nucleares de injusticia.
					
					No nos importan los disparates que EE.UU. y sus fuerzas seguidoras soltaran en cuanto al presente lanzamiento de prueba, agrego y enfatizo que tales imprudencias aceleraran solo su autodestruccion. Advirtio que el mejor remedio para evadir nuestro ataque aniquilador es que ellos mantengan calma sin atentar a nuestra dignidad y seguridad.
					
					Los enemigos no deben menospreciar en absoluto nuestra capacidad, acentuo y continuo que mostraremos claramente a todo el mundo como nos levantamos majestuosamente rompiendo las cadenas de sancion, bloqueo y presion de los enemigos. 
					
					Para hacer frente a la guerra total, la nuclear, con EE.UU. que puede estallar en cualquier momento, el dominio de ciencia de defensa nacional debe dar mas acicate a la fabricacion de los armamentos nucleares, y al mismo tiempo, concentrar todas las fuerzas en el desarrollo de los medios de su transporte, enfatizo. 
					
					Y ordeno seguir demostrando de manera escalonada todas las medidas practicas que puede mostrar la digna potencia militar en caso de que los enemigos se atrevan a amenazar nuestra dignidad y derecho a existencia.
					
					Recibio fervorosamente en el puerto a los trabajadores del sector cientifico de defensa nacional y los oficiales y soldados de fuerzas navales quienes regresan tras lanzar con exito el SLBM, les dio calurosa felicitacion y se fotografio junto con ellos.

articles.title: Cuadros de Partido y Estado visitan Museo de la Historia Revolucionaria de MINFAP
articles.content:
Cuadros de Partido y Estado visitan Museo de la Historia Revolucionaria de MINFAP
Pyongyang, 25 de agosto (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 56o aniversario del inicio de la orientacion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, los cuadros directivos del Partido y el Estado visitaron hoy el Museo de la Historia Revolucionaria del Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares.
					  En la ocasion participaron los miembros del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju y Choe Ryong Hae, y otros cuadros directivos del Partido y el Estado, y los funcionarios del Consejo de Ministros, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales.
					
					  Ellos rindieron homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il tras depositar ramos de flores ante sus estatuas de bronce erguidas en el MINFAP.
					
					Luego, recorrieron el pabellon "Comandante Supremo y sus Companeros de Armas" en el museo.

articles.title: Miembros de Direccion de MPLA expresan voluntad de desarrollar relaciones con PTC
articles.content:
Miembros de Direccion de MPLA expresan voluntad de desarrollar relaciones con PTC
Pyongyang, 25 de agosto (ACNC) -- Al departir con la delegacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea que toma parte en el VII Congreso del Movimiento Popular de Liberacion de Angola (MPLA), los miembros de la Direccion del MPLA expresaron la voluntad de fortalecer mas las relaciones de cooperacion entre los dos partidos y los dos paises. 
					El secretario general Juliao Mateus Paulo dijo que las relaciones entre los dos partidos son mas excelentes que el pasado y se fortalecen cada dia mas y continuo:
					
					El PTC conducido por el Presidente Kim Jong Un y el MPLA dirigido por el Presidente Jose Eduardo Dos Santos alcanzan grandes exitos en la lucha por el bienestar del pueblo. 
					
					El Occidente recurre a la demagogia de todos tipos para sembrar la discordia entre nuestros dos partidos y dos paises e intensifica mas las censuras y calumnias a medida que marchan bien los trabajos en los dos paises. 
					
					Pero, seguira avanzando victoriosamente la causa comun del PTC y el MPLA.
					
					Apoyamos activamente la causa del PTC que bajo la sabia guia del companero Kim Jong Un lucha resueltamente contra las fuerzas hostiles.
					
					En el futuro tambien, el MPLA hara ingentes esfuerzos por consolidar y desarrollar las relaciones entre los dos partidos y los dos paises. 
					
					El secretario Jorge Inocencio Dombolo subrayo que la participacion de la delegacion del PTC en el VII Congreso del MPLA constituye un motivo significativo para manifestar el poderio de las tradicionales relaciones de amistad entre los dos partidos, consolidadas y desarrolladas a base del apoyo mutuo y la solidaridad. 
					
					El jefe del Departamento de Relaciones Exteriores dijo que en el futuro tambien el MPLA y el pueblo angoleno se esforzaran activamente por fortalecer invariablemente las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con el PTC y el pueblo coreano.

articles.title: CCPAP llama a sepultar a banda de Park Geun-hye, sirviente de guerra de EE.UU.
articles.content:
CCPAP llama a sepultar a banda de Park Geun-hye, sirviente de guerra de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 25 de agosto (ACNC) -- El presidente estadounidense Obama habia presentado como su promesa electoral la construccion del "mundo sin armas nucleares".
					Y en estos momentos en que se acerca el vencimiento de su mandato, expresa la voluntad de declarar el "no uso primero de armas nucleares". 
					
					En una declaracion publicada este jueves, el portavoz del Comite Coreano por la Paz de Asia y el Pacifico (CCPAP) senalo que esa farsa deviene una artimana para recuperar su prestigio empolvando el cartel de "mundo sin armas nucleares" y una burla y el climax de cinismo a la humanidad que desea la paz y la estabilidad del mundo. 
					
					Lo mas abominable es la conducta ridicula de la banda surcoreana que impaciente ante la farsa de su amo norteamericano insiste en que no debe renunciar el principio de ataque preventivo nuclear, senalo el portavoz y continuo:
					
					El acto humillante de los titeres surcoreanos muestra fehacientemente su naturaleza de los necios y pobres lacayos coloniales que no pueden mantener ni un momento su vida al librarse de la mano de su amo gringo. 
					
					Al mismo tiempo, revela de nuevo a todo el mundo que hasta la fecha ellos han venido esperando la oportunidad de provocar la guerra nuclear contra la misma nacion haciendo como hecho consumado junto con EE.UU. el ataque preventivo a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					El ataque preventivo nuclear es la doctrina de agresion abierta y gangsteril que EE.UU mantiene invariablemente desde el primer dia de su posesion de armas nucleares. 
					
					La RPDC poseyo las armas nucleares y vino fortaleciendolas constantemente, lo cual es una justa medida para defender la soberania del pais y el derecho a la existencia de la nacion desde la incesante amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU. 
					
					Cuanto mas EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos recurren perversamente a las maniobras de provocacion de guerra nuclear contra la RPDC, tanto mas se fortalecera el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa de la RPDC. 
					
					Aunque los titeres surcoreanos hablen tanto de la "amenaza nuclear" y "provocacion" del Norte (RPDC), no pueden ocultar el intento del ataque preventivo nuclear de EE.UU. contra RPDC y sus artimanas criminales tendentes a provocar la peligrosa guerra nuclear en adhesion a su amo gringo. 
					
					Son la banda de traidores a la nacion las autoridades surcoreanas que tratan de acarrear los desastres de la guerra nuclear a la Peninsula Coreana solicitando con ansiedad el golpe preventivo nuclear a EE.UU., que persigue dominar con las armas nucleares el mundo. 
					
					Todos los miembros de la nacion coreana deben levantarse como un solo hombre en la lucha por eliminar la camarilla traidora surcoreana, abominable sirviente de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. y maniaca de guerra nuclear, y defender la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: Condecorados ameritados en construccion de Central Hidroelectrica Heroes Jovenes Paektusan No.3
articles.content:
Condecorados ameritados en construccion de Central Hidroelectrica Heroes Jovenes Paektusan No.3 
Pyongyang, 25 de agosto (ACNC) -- La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea condecoro a los funcionarios, los miembros de mando e integrantes de la brigada juvenil y los constructores que realizaron meritos laborales en la construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica Heroes Jovenes Paektusan No.3, y los funcionarios, cientificos, tecnicos y obreros que contribuyeron a la produccion de equipos encargados y al aseguramiento y el transporte de materiales necesarios a la misma obra. 
					Fue otorgado el titulo de Heroe del Trabajo junto con la Medalla de Oro "El Martillo y la Hoz" y la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase a Jon Yong Nam, Jon Chun Gil, Kim Phok Sun y otras 11 personas. 
					
					El Premio de Honor Juvenil Kim Il Sung fue concedido a 22 personas, y el Premio de Honor Juvenil Kim Jong Il a 25. 
					
					Fue otorgado el titulo de Chofer Benemerito a 2 personas; la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase a 67; la Orden del Trabajo a 17; la Orden Bandera Nacional de segunda clase a 363; la Orden Bandera Nacional de tercera clase a 858; la Medalla del Merito Militar a 2; y la Medalla del Merito Laboral a 866.
					
					Quedo publicado el dia 25 el decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC.

articles.title: Otorgadas medallas a constructores de Central Hidroelectrica Heroes Jovenes Paektusan
articles.content:
Otorgadas medallas a constructores de Central Hidroelectrica Heroes Jovenes Paektusan
Pyongyang, 25 de agosto (ACNC) -- Fue otorgada la Medalla Conmemorativa de la Construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica Heroes Jovenes Paektusan a 3 mil 51 funcionarios, miembros de mando e integrantes de la brigada juvenil y constructores que participaron en la construccion de esta central.
					Quedo publicado este jueves el decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
